ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: REST for non-Web Applications
ygData.msgSnippet: The difference is that ROA is based on HTTP, whereas in principle REST is not tied to HTTP, but HTTP 1.1 was setup the REST way. I think that is the
